Situation.Name: The Map and the Rulebook
Situation.Setting: A cyberpunk workshop-study — part dev workspace, part cartographer's den. A large holographic map of a software system floats above a heavy wooden desk, its nodes and pathways glowing in cyan and magenta. The map is stylized like an old nautical chart but rendered in holographic light — routes, landmarks, and annotations visible. Beside the map on the desk sits an open leather-bound rulebook with glowing text on its pages, its margins annotated in handwriting. The book is thick, well-worn, clearly personal — not a corporate manual but a practitioner's journal of principles.
Situation.Camera: Mid-shot, slightly wide, character off-center left with map and rulebook filling the right half of frame

CharacterPose.Expression: Knowing half-smile, eyes sharp and confident — the look of someone who can predict where things are
CharacterPose.BodyPosition: Standing at the desk, one hand resting on the open rulebook, weight shifted forward with engagement
CharacterPose.Gesture: Other hand gesturing toward a specific node on the holographic map, as if saying 'it should be right here'

Article.Name: Holographic system map
Article.Description: A large floating map rendered like an old nautical chart but in holographic light — nodes represent modules, glowing pathways show connections, handwritten annotations mark design decisions. Some routes are well-worn and bright, others faded.
Article.Application: Floating above desk, primary visual element on right side of frame
Article.SymbolicMeaning: The mental model — principles made visible as navigation

Article.Name: Leather-bound principles journal
Article.Description: A thick, well-worn leather book open to pages with glowing text — short rules and principles visible. Margins are full of handwritten notes, cross-outs, and revisions. Some pages have dog-ears. This is not a pristine reference — it's a living document.
Article.Application: Open on desk beneath the map, one hand resting on it
Article.SymbolicMeaning: Articulated principles — the rulebook you write yourself over a career

Environment.Name: Cyberpunk workshop desk

Environment.Name: Background shelving
Environment.Description: Shelves with mix of old books and holographic storage cubes, suggesting accumulated knowledge
Environment.Application: Soft-focus background, adds depth and history

KeyDetails: The holographic map should feel like a navigable mental model — not a generic tech diagram but something personal and annotated
The rulebook should look lived-in: dog-eared, annotated, revised — principles that evolved over time
The gesture toward the map conveys 'I know where this is because I know how I think'
Warm amber light from the desk contrasts cool cyan/magenta of the holographic map
Situation.LightingFocus: Warm amber glow from the desk and rulebook pages, cool cyan-magenta glow from the holographic map above, creating a split warm/cool lighting on the character's face that suggests the bridge between personal knowledge and system understanding
